nodes.long_description:
All On Board! è lo strumento perfetto per gli appassionati di giochi da tavolo che vogliono portare la loro passione al livello successivo! Connettiti con giocatori di tutto il mondo per divertirti con giochi da tavolo con licenza. Tutti devono avere All On Board! per giocare, ma solo l’host deve possedere il DLC e può invitare gli altri a unirsi alla sua sessione senza ulteriori acquisti.

{1269730997882447}

Prova giochi su licenza in VR/XR, fedeli alle versioni fisiche, con comandi intuitivi, ambienti immersivi personalizzati e gameplay fluido.

{1254770506145506}

- Simulatore VR/XR immersivo con fisica realistica e controlli intuitivi
- Basta una copia per ospitare sessioni su licenza
- Catalogo in espansione di giochi da tavolo adattati con cura per la VR
- Supporto multipiattaforma e multilingue
- Gioca gratis a una selezione crescente di classici
- Ogni gioco include un “Centro Apprendimento” con risorse per imparare le regole
- Tante modalità e generi: solitario, PvP e cooperativo
- Salva e riprendi le partite quando vuoi, ideale per giochi lunghi o sessioni flessibili

{627190099949374}

Unisciti alle nostre community ufficiali su Discord o Telegram per trovare altri giocatori e partecipare alle partite (avversari IA non ancora disponibili)

Sviluppato da uno studio indipendente guidato dalla passione, impegnato a offrire aggiornamenti regolari, nuovi giochi e funzionalità in continua crescita.


{786055897409926}
nodes.short_description:
All On Board! dà vita ai tuoi giochi da tavolo preferiti nella realtà mista come mai prima d’ora. Goditi partite immersive con comandi intuitivi, fisica realistica e funzioni intelligenti che rendono il gioco fluido e sociale. Unisciti a una vivace community di appassionati di giochi da tavolo da tutto il mondo e organizza una serata di gioco indimenticabile con i tuoi amici, anche se siete lontani.

Indossa il tuo visore e immergiti nel futuro dei giochi da tavolo!

nodes.long_description:
All On Board! is the perfect tool for board gaming enthusiasts looking to take their hobby to the next level! Connect with players worldwide to enjoy licensed board games, everyone must have All On Board! to play, but only the host needs to own the DLC and can invite others to join their session without any additional purchase.
{756860736720817}
Enjoy premium licensed titles in VR/XR, carefully adapted to be as faithful and engaging as their physical counterpart. With intuitive controls, custom immersive environments and polished gameplay.
{1266488808465482}
- Fully immersive VR/XR game simulator with lifelike physics and smooth, intuitive controls
- Like in real life, only a single copy of the board game title is required to host a licensed title
- A growing catalogue of prestigious board game IPs, each one carefully adapted for virtual reality to be as enjoyable as the original
- Cross‑platform and multi‑language support
- Play a growing selection of classic board games completely free
- Every game features a “Learning Hub” with several resources to get you up to speed with the rules
- Wide range of board game genres, modes and player counts supported, including solo, PvP and coop
- Save and restore your game sessions at any time.
{1513545693148653}

Join our official Discord or Telegram communities to find other players and jump into games (no AI opponents yet)

Built by an indie team with no investors, focused on updates, features and new games.

{1721994118426414}
nodes.short_description:
All On Board! brings your favorite board games to life in mixed reality like never before. Enjoy immersive sessions with intuitive controls, lifelike physics and smart features that make playing smooth and social. Join a vibrant community of board game lovers around the world, and set up an unforgettable game night with your crew, even if you are in a different location.

Put on your headset and step into the future of board gaming!

nodes.long_description:
All On Board! ist das perfekte Tool für Brettspiel-Enthusiasten, die ihr Hobby auf die nächste Stufe heben möchten! Verbinde dich mit Spielern auf der ganzen Welt, um lizenzierte Brettspiele zu genießen. Jeder muss All On Board! besitzen, um zu spielen, aber nur der Host benötigt das DLC und kann andere einladen, seiner Sitzung ohne zusätzliche Käufe beizutreten.

{1048192680799594}

Erlebe hochwertige Lizenzspiele in VR/XR – originalgetreu umgesetzt mit intuitiver Steuerung, maßgeschneiderten Umgebungen und einem geschliffenen Spielerlebnis.

{770058845442529}

- Immersiver VR/XR-Brettspielsimulator mit realistischer Physik und intuitiver Steuerung
- Eine Kopie reicht aus, um lizenzierte Partien zu hosten
- Wachsende Auswahl an Top-Titeln, sorgfältig für VR umgesetzt
- Plattformübergreifend und mehrsprachig
- Spiele viele klassische Brettspiele kostenlos
- Lernzentrum mit Ressourcen zum schnellen Regelverständnis
- Breite Auswahl an Genres und Modi: Solo, PvP, Koop
- Speichern und Fortsetzen jederzeit – ideal für lange Spiele oder flexible Sessions

{1825960721322777}

Tritt unserer offiziellen Community auf Discord oder Telegram bei, um Mitspieler zu finden und direkt loszulegen (KI-Gegner derzeit nicht verfügbar)

Entwickelt von einem unabhängigen Studio, das von Leidenschaft angetrieben wird – mit dem Ziel, regelmäßig Updates, neue Spiele und Funktionen zu liefern.

{1458220045415720}
nodes.short_description:
All On Board! erweckt deine Lieblings-Brettspiele in Mixed Reality wie nie zuvor zum Leben. Genieße immersive Spielrunden mit intuitiver Steuerung, realistischer Physik und cleveren Funktionen, die das Spielen reibungslos und gesellig machen. Werde Teil einer lebendigen Community von Brettspielfans aus aller Welt und veranstalte einen unvergesslichen Spieleabend mit deiner Gruppe – selbst wenn ihr an verschiedenen Orten seid.

Setz das Headset auf und tauche ein in die Zukunft des Brettspiels!

nodes.long_description:
All On Board! es la herramienta perfecta para los entusiastas de los juegos de mesa que quieran llevar su afición al siguiente nivel. Conéctate con jugadores de todo el mundo para disfrutar de juegos de mesa con licencia. Todos deben tener All On Board! para jugar, pero solo el anfitrión necesita el DLC y puede invitar a otros sin compras adicionales.

{1093798885534135}

Disfruta de títulos premium con licencia en VR/XR, fieles a la versión física, con controles intuitivos, entornos inmersivos y una experiencia pulida.

{1482797606235589}

- Simulador inmersivo de juegos de mesa en VR/XR con físicas realistas y controles intuitivos
- Al igual que en la mesa, solo necesitas una copia para organizar partidas de títulos licenciados
- Catálogo creciente de licencias reconocidas, adaptadas con mimo para VR y tan divertidas como la original
- Soporte multiplataforma y multilenguaje
- Juega a una selección creciente de clásicos de mesa completamente gratis
- Todos los juegos incluyen “Centro de Aprendizaje” con recursos y reglas
- Amplia variedad de géneros, modos y jugadores: solitario, PvP y cooperativo
- Guarda y continúa tus partidas cuando quieras

{1091117019056443}

Únete a nuestras comunidades oficiales en Discord o Telegram para encontrar otros jugadores y sumarte a partidas (sin rivales IA, de momento).

Creado por un estudio independiente movido por la pasión, no por inversores, comprometido con actualizaciones, más juegos y nuevas funciones.

{1432887354426652}
nodes.short_description:
All On Board! da vida a tus juegos de mesa favoritos en realidad mixta como nunca antes. Disfruta de partidas inmersivas con controles intuitivos, físicas realistas y funciones inteligentes que hacen que jugar sea fluido y social. Únete a una comunidad de amantes de los juegos de mesa de todo el mundo y organiza una noche de juegos inolvidable con tu grupo, incluso estando en lugares diferentes.

¡Únete y adéntrate en el futuro de los juegos de mesa!

nodes.long_description:
All On Board! est l’outil idéal pour les passionnés de jeux de société qui souhaitent faire passer leur loisir au niveau supérieur ! Connectez-vous avec des joueurs du monde entier pour profiter de jeux de société sous licence. Tout le monde doit posséder All On Board! pour jouer, mais seul l’hôte doit posséder le DLC et peut inviter les autres à rejoindre sa session sans achat supplémentaire.

{1457869152034657}

Profitez de jeux premium sous licence en VR/XR, fidèles à leur version physique, avec contrôles intuitifs, environnements immersifs et expérience soignée.

{1463732271293563}

- Simulateur VR/XR immersif avec physiques réalistes et contrôles intuitifs
- Comme en vrai, une seule copie suffit pour organiser une partie officielle
- Catalogue grandissant de licences adaptées avec soin pour la VR
- Multiplateforme et multilingue
- Jouez gratuitement à une sélection de classiques
- “Centre d’Apprentissage” avec ressources et règles pour chaque jeu
- Grande variété de genres, modes et joueurs : solo, PvP, coopératif
- Sauvegardez et reprenez vos parties à tout moment

{727775900141776}

Rejoignez nos communautés sur Discord ou Telegram pour trouver d’autres joueurs et lancer des parties (pas d’IA pour le moment).

Développé par un studio indépendant animé par la passion, engagé à offrir mises à jour, nouveaux jeux et fonctionnalités.

{1074388514816063}
nodes.short_description:
All On Board! donne vie à vos jeux de société préférés en réalité mixte, comme jamais auparavant. Vivez des parties immersives grâce à des commandes intuitives, une physique réaliste et des fonctionnalités intelligentes qui rendent l’expérience fluide et conviviale. Rejoignez une communauté passionnée de joueurs du monde entier et organisez une soirée jeux inoubliable avec vos amis, même à distance.

Mettez votre casque et découvrez le futur du jeu de société !

nodes.long_description:
All On Board! is a revolutionary tabletop platform built from the ground up specifically for VR, created by and for board game enthusiasts. As the only platform natively built for VR, All On Board! fully exploits the capabilities of virtual reality to deliver an unmatched board gaming experience. This includes predictive selection and positioning of board elements while enjoying realistic physical interactions close to real life. A unique platform that is constantly evolving, both functionally and in its game catalog, packed with beloved franchises among board game enthusiasts.

Experience the joy of discovering new games, just like browsing the latest releases at your favorite store: All On Board! brings you shared moments of discussion, laughter, and nostalgia reminiscent of past adventures and unforgettable games.

Features:

- Only one player is required to purchase game titles: If you own a game, you can invite your friends to play for free, just like in real life
- Experience interactions that are intuitive and naturally immersive
- Top-tier games meticulously adapted for VR, ensuring exceptional gameplay and smooth interactions
- Quickly learn the rules with in-game tutorials and contextual help that provides more information about any component
- Tailored gameplay for 1 to multiple players, including solo and co-op modes. You can even tackle cooperative games on your own!
- Cross-platform support
- Play in your preferred language, with ongoing additions to our language support
nodes.short_description: Designed from the ground up for VR, All On Board! offers seamless board game experiences. Join this ever-evolving platform and connect with fellow board game enthusiasts! Choose your avatar and enjoy playing solo or with friends, diving into some of the most popular board game franchises.
